title: SOLD   1907-09 Novelty Cutlery postcard * Eddie COLLINS * HOF * PSA 2 (only 4^)
author: rickalaska

posts.post_title: SOLD   1907-09 Novelty Cutlery postcard * Eddie COLLINS * HOF * PSA 2 (only 4^)
posts.post_content:
SOLD

Rare and highly prized 1907-09 Novelty Cutlery postcard of HOF great Eddie Collins.  PSA has graded only 6 of these with just 4 graded higher than this one.  Collins was inducted into the Hall of Fame in 1939.  Member of the 3,000 hit club (3,315 hits).  Won 6 World Series championships.  Was a clean member of the infamous 1919 "Black" Sox.  Postcard has some soiling on the front and back.  Corners appear strong and there are no creases noted.
